data.title: Watch 2024 Chinese Spring Festival Gala Online

data.meta_description: Watch 2024 Chinese Spring Festival Gala Online, Luna Chinese New Year Gala, China Spring Gala Rebroadcast
data.text:
How to Watch 2024 Chinese Spring Festival Gala Online? Chinese CCTV New Year's Gala

Every year, Chinese spring gala is a must-watch for every Chinese people all over the world. This year (2024), the Chinese Luna New Year Eve (27/Jan/2024, Friday), the Gala will begin at 20:00pm (Beijing Time).

If you are oversea, you can use the following resources to watch this important event online. The Chinese Spring Festival Gala is being watched by millions of millions of people every year.

YOUTUBE 2024 Chinese Spring Gala Live Video Streaming and Rebroadcast

CNTV Official 2024 Chinese Spring Gala Live Video Streaming and Rebroadcast

CCTV-1 2024 Chinese Spring Gala Live Video Streaming and Rebroadcast

The annual Chinese New Year Gala usually lasts around 4 hours from 20:00pm (GMT 8, Beijing Time) on New Yearâ€™s Eve to the midnight. Please enjoy watching the Chinese Spring Festival Gala with your family and Hope you have a very happy Chinese Luna New Year!

The Gala is hosted by China Central Television (CCTV) and is known in Chinese as Chunwan. It is shown the the eve of CHinese Lunar New Year since 1983 (first time televised live worldwide).

The Gala every year offers featuring performances including musical, comedy, dancing drama etc. This page will be updated at real time to provide you the work resources for 2024 Chinese Lunar Gala. Happy 2024 Chinese Lunar New Year!

2024 Spring Chunwan Gala

Time: Feb-04-2024

How to Download the Chinese Spring Festival Gala Video?

You could use the video downloader online tool. Alternatively, this Chrome Extension may be useful in saving the Gala video to a local copy.

Please also see other version of this page here.
